ai-patthana14.27:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.27:1.1_0: The teaching should be given up by development, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.27:1.1_1: The teaching should be given up by developing, and the causes of development (of the First Path) does not give up.
ai-patthana14.27:1.1_2: Thoughts that are to be given up in development and to give up the bases of development (of the First Path)
ai-patthana14.27:2.1_0: The teaching should not be given up, nor cause, be given up, and conditioned by development.
ai-patthana14.27:3.1_0: The teaching should be given up by development, and not give up the base for development of the path to developing the recollections of development. The reason for developing the practice that leads to the development of developing it.
ai-patthana14.27:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
